original_text: He wants to save all people. He wants everyone to know his message about what is true.
korean_text: 하나님은 모든 사람이 구원을 받으며 진리를 아는 데에 이르기를 원하시느니라

sentences.original_text: He wants to save all people
He wants everyone to know his message
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 사람이 그의 메시지를 알기를 원하신다
